about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk city in Gravity Dash, a 2D infinite runner that will test your reflexes and focus skills. Immerse yourself in the retro atmosphere, accompanied by a pulsating synthwave soundtrack that sets the tone.


Master the art of gravity manipulation as you jump, dash, and switch gravity to overcome obstacles. Navigate through the void and skillfully dodge explosive barrels to keep your run going.


Play through three distinct levels, each lasting 180 seconds. With each level, experience a new layer of difficulty that will test your skills and keep the excitement levels high. The longer you run, the faster you become.


For gamers seeking a real challenge, venture into the infinite level without any time constraints. See how far you can push your limits as the difficulty dynamically increases, providing an endless challenge for the most skilled players.

Gravity Dash is a thrilling race against time and obstacles in a cyberpunk setting. Can you dash, jump, and defy gravity to become the ultimate infinite runner? It's time to find out. Strap in and prepare for a wild run!

name: Gravity Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk city in Gravity Dash, a 2D infinite runner that will test your reflexes and strategic skills. Immerse yourself in the retro atmosphere, accompanied by a pulsating synthwave soundtrack that sets the tone.
